body:
One other comment -
If you doing this in DOS on windows then you probably need to use double
quotes in the rcalc command like this:
 ... | rcalc -f ulim.cal -e "$1=ulim($2/PI)"
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2012-November/009045.html).</sup>
